fields.Title of Presentation: Linguistic Repertoires, Institutional Data, and the Ecology of Writing Placement
fields.Description/Abstract: <span style="font-weight:400;">Despite the simplistic nature of institutional data collected on linguistic diversity among U.S.-resident students, the presenter will demonstrate how a combination of data points, including students’ constructions of their linguistic repertoires, can persuade campus partners to share responsibility for developing linguistically inclusive placement and other institutional practices. </span>
